subject: Re: Order #SSN5258, how did it go?
description_text:
Hello I am still waiting for the refund, can you please give me an update on that? Thanks Timo Gesendet mit der GMX Mail App Am 19.01.26 um 07:56 schrieb SIMSONN
 
 
 
 
 Von: "SIMSONN" <no-reply@loox.io> Datum: 19. Januar 2026 An: timo.lamm@gmx.de Cc: Betreff: Order #SSN5258, how did it go?
 
 
 Hello Timo, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
